PreparerFirmBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1: FRIED AND KOWGIOS PARTNERS CPA'S LLP

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO EXPAND AND EMBODY THE PUBLIC SQUARE WITH DRAMATIC ART.
IRS990.MissionDescription: THE MISSION OF TRINITY REPERTORY COMPANY IS TO PROMOTE THE APPRECIATION OF THEATRE THROUGH THEATRICAL PRODUCTIONS, PROVIDE AND SUPPORT FACILITIES FOR EDUCATION AND INSTRUCTION IN THE ART OF THEATRE.
IRS990.Description: DURING THE 2009-2010 SEASON, TRINITY REPERTORY COMPANY PRODUCED SEVEN PLAYS, INCLUDING CABARET, A CHRISTMAS CAROL, SHOOTING STAR, THE TWELFTH NIGHT, ODD COUPLE, THE SYRINGA TREE AND DEAD MAN'S CELL PHONE. TRINITY REPERTORY COMPANY ALSO OFFERS A WIDE RANGE OF EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS, IN-SCHOOL ARTIST RESIDENCIES, WORKSHOPS, PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT FOR TEACHERS, AFTER-SCHOOL AND SUMMER PROGRAMS.

Activity2.Description: THE BROWN UNIVERSITY/TRINITY REP MFA PROGRAMS OFFERS OPPORTUNITIES AND RESOURCES THAT ARE REVOLUTIONIZING THE FIELD OF THEATRE EDUCATION. IT COMBINES THE BEST ASPECTS OF CONSERVATORY TRAINING WITH THE PRACTICAL EXPERIENCE OF BEING CONNECTED TO A PROFESSIONAL THEATRE AND THE ACADEMIC CREDENTIALS OF AN IVY LEAGUE UNIVERSITY.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Intended Use of Endowment Funds:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: the earnings on the endowment funds are to be used for the various program initiatives as stipulated by the donors.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Uncertain Tax Positions Under FIN 48:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: The Organization believes that it has appropriate support for any tax positions taken, and as such, does not have any uncertain tax positions.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 2
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: john lombardo and hannah bell-lombardo are married.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: DRAFT OF FORM 990 HAS BEEN REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES' EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE, AUDIT COMMITTEE AND KEY EMPLOYEES.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION REQUESTS ALL BOARD MEMBERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES TO SIGN AN ANNUAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY CERTIFICATION. IN ADDITION, BOARD MEMBERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES ARE REQUESTED TO COMPLETE AN ANNUAL FORM 990 DISCLOSURE, WHICH REQUESTS DISCLOSURE OF ANY INTEREST THAT COULD GIVE RISE TO CONFLICTS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: COMPENSATION OF KEY EMPLOYEES IS APPROVED BY THE BOARD AND/OR COMMITTEES. COMPENSATION IS GENERALLY BASED ON INDUSTRY STANDARD.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: FORM 990 IS AVAILABLE ONLINE AT WWW.GUIDESTAR.ORG. ALL OTHER DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
THE BOARD HAS APPROVED THE AUDIT COMMITTEE FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT.
